attributes.action: Urge Israel to end it's crimes agaisnt the Palestinian people, withdraw from the West Bank and East Jerusalem and to allow economic flow in the Gaza strip and in the rest of Palestine.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Israel still brutally and illegally occupies the West Bank and East Jeruslaem and allows no money, food, or even water in our out of Gaza.

A mere 245,000 settlers receieve 75% of the water while 3 million Palestinians are rationed the rest. Those settlers also receive military protection while the Palestinians are subject to daily abuse.

Why does the Government allow this?
